授業方法:
1. This course will be conducted in English only and English will be the means of communication between the students and the instructor. (Students will also be expected to communicate with one another in English.)
2. Students are encouraged to actively participate in class discussions, both independently and collaboratively, in order to enhance their competence and confidence in English and also to create a better learning environment for all.

第3回: Unit 4b: Business - Managing International Business Meetings
第4回: Unit 4b: Business - Managing International Business Meetings
第5回: Unit 4b: Business - Managing International Business Meetings
第6回: Unit 4b: Business - Managing International Business Meetings
トピック.授業外学習2: One to two hours of homework can be expected each week. Students will be asked to watch course materials online, mostly lecture videos, throughout the semester.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Students’ final grade will derive from a combination of assignments, activities, presentations, mini-tests, etc.
